notification.title: Notification & Toast
notification.description: Left border 3px semantic color. Auto-dismiss progress bar. Position: top-right.

modal.title: Modal & Dialog
modal.description: Backdrop: blur(4px). Container: surface-3. Title: Orbitron 16px uppercase. Close: ✕.
modal.confirm_body: This action cannot be undone. All associated data will be permanently removed from the system.

tooltip.title: Tooltip & Popover
tooltip.description: Tooltip: #222 bg, 12px, non-interactive. Popover: surface-2, shadow-lg, interactive.

loading.title: Loading, Skeleton & Spinner
loading.description: Diamond spinner with clip-path. Skeleton shimmer effect. Loading dots.

empty_state.title: Empty State
empty_state.description: Icon 48px, title Orbitron 18px uppercase. CTA button. Context-specific variants.

error_pages.title: Error Pages
error_pages.description: Error code: Orbitron 120px glitch animation. Color-coded by error type.

offline.title: Offline State
offline.description: Full page and inline banner variants. Network status indicator.
offline.banner_text: You are currently offline. Some features may not be available.

success.title: Success State / Confirmation
success.description: Checkmark icon animated. Green accent. Minimal affirming text.
success.success_message: Operation complete. Changes have been saved.

validation.title: Inline Validation
validation.description: Field-level: icon prefix ✕/✓/⚠. Real-time debounced 300ms, on-blur, on-submit.
validation.password_error: ✕ Password must be at least 8 characters.

banner.title: Banner & Alert (Persistent)
banner.description: Inline alerts with semantic bg tint. Top-of-page banner: yellow bg, black text.

toast-notification.type: Semantic type controlling color and icon
toast-notification.title: Bold uppercase heading text
toast-notification.duration: Auto-dismiss time in ms. Set 0 for persistent.

api.toast_info: Shows an info toast with blue left border and info icon.
api.toast_success: Shows a success toast with green left border and checkmark icon.
api.toast_error: Shows an error toast with red left border and alert icon.

api.useModal: Hook to manage modal open/close state with escape key handling built-in.

kbd.1: Move focus to the next element within the modal (focus trap)
kbd.2: Move focus to the previous element within the modal

tooltip-popover.delay: Hover delay in ms before showing (tooltip only)
tooltip-popover.interactive: If true, renders as popover (clickable content)

inline-validation.debounce: Debounce delay in ms for onChange trigger

banner-alert.variant: Inline alert or full-width top banner
